DOC.brief_summary: To evaluate the healing rate and safety of Lafutidine in erosive esophagitis
DOC.brief_title: A Multi-center, Randomized, Double-blind Phase III Clinical Trial to Assess and Compare to the Efficacy and Safety of Lafutidine, Famotidine and Omeprazole-referenced in Korean Erosive Esophagitis Patients
DOC.criteria: Patients who had symptoms of heartburn with a diagnosis of grade A to D reflux esophagitis according to the Los Angeles classification Gastric or duodenal ulcers (excluding ulcer scars) Concurrent presence of Barrett's esophagus A history of a poor response to H2RA or PPI given in the recommended dose for 8 weeks Other conditions considered by the attending physician to potentially affect the assessment of efficacy and safety
